ai-atk-abh03a41:53_1: However, since there is something worth a sixteenth part of the aggregates, they don’t know the offense.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_2: it’s said to be the wrap gangster.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_3: And second questions ask for those who disparage the perfected ones.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_4: The pretext of deceiveness is finished.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_5: I have no use for anyone—
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_6: it’s said to be the wrap gangster.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_7: Recollection of the form of the forms, the ending of forms, the perfected one, and the fully awakened Buddha does not fully understand.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_8: While on the path to the next world is not the best of feelings, the stream-enterers, not the face-to-face with the aim of perfection.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_9: And it’s not a mixion that one thing; it won’t belong to the same Buddhist sect.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_10: And this is what I said in brief.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_11: But I didn’t also understand form in the company of form.
ai-atk-abh03a41:53_12: He understands the aggregates, and they completely understand the aggregates.
ai-atk-abh03a41:54_0: He accordingly bubbles in one eye, imagining form, and feelings. So its outcome and result they’ll be born into a single path.
ai-atk-abh03a41:54_1: Thinking it was what I said.
ai-atk-abh03a41:54_2: Since they’re inquired by form, and don’t get carried away. And the meaning of the teachings they needed to listen.
ai-atk-abh03a41:54_3: This is the meaning of this all.
ai-atk-abh03a41:56_0: The chapter on the beautiful aggregates is finished.
